features.name: Effectiveness
features.description: How well the air freshener works to eliminate odors and clean the air.
evidence_sentences: Excellent clean air feel and gets rid of odors efficiently.
It does help with the stale air but doesn't do much for eliminating odors.
it's really doing a good job on absorbing odor.
It is effective at removing dust and other allergens from the air.
It definitely removes odors.

features.name: Settings and Control
features.description: The variety and usability of settings on the air freshener.
evidence_sentences: Cleans the air
This is our third Holmes air freshener, to use in our third room--it's a necessity with teenagers.
excellent air cleaner.
Works well, like that it has 3 settings, mostly keep it on low, occasionally higher if there's smoke or a bad smell in my apartment.
I like the various settings.

features.name: Filter Quality
features.description: The condition and performance of the filter inside the air freshener.
evidence_sentences: This air purifier is quality build with many selections of filtration power and also has the ionizer.
Great filter, works well -- the air in my room is so clean.
The filter is outstanding.
They definitely make a difference in air quality and the replacement filters are inexpensive.
Filters great but needs cleaning frequently.

features.name: Design and Build
features.description: The overall design and construction of the air freshener.
evidence_sentences: This is our third Holmes air freshener, to use in our third room--it's a necessity with teenagers.
Purchased to help with clean air in my place.
Great air purifier.
A super buy for a great air purifier.
This is a great air purifier.

summary.text: The air freshener works well, like that it has 3 settings, mostly keep it on low, occasionally higher if there's smoke or a bad smell in my apartment. On the high setting, you can see the dust from half (5-feet) the room away get picked up and sucker into the pad on th HIGH setting. The filter inside was all black and the unit smelled like burning plastic. Please, please do not

The filter inside was all black
